dict.acceptation: 使结冰，使冻僵；冷藏；吓呆；冻结（存款，工资等）；

sent.orig: Cryoblast-More radius and more freeze power makes it freeze larger objects.
sent.trans: 冰冻冲击——更大范围更强力量的冰冻束，可以冻结大型对象。

sent.orig: Methods: TotanshinoneIIA Nano-liposomes were prepared by freeze-melt, reverse phase evaporation and ultrasonic bath-refining-freeze-drying.
sent.trans: 分别采用冻融法、逆相蒸发法、超声-匀浆-冷冻干燥法制备丹参酮IIA纳米脂质体。

sent.orig: We should get used to the market demand of consumer, develop freeze-dry food industry actively.
sent.trans: 我们应该适应消费者的市场需求，积极发展冻干食品工业。

sent.orig: After freeze-thaw cycle treatment, the surface pores of material had been extended, multiplied.
sent.trans: 冻融处理后材料表面的孔隙明显变大、增多。

sent.orig: MCCAIN: How a spending freeze on everything but defense, veteran affairs and entitlement programs.
sent.trans: 麦凯恩：（你们觉得）冻结所有的开销，除了国防，退伍军人事务和社会福利程序怎么样？
